Title: Dedicates a portion of the state highway system to "Trooper Gerard B. Kane and Trooper Arthur B. Reddy"
Summary: Dedicates the bridge over the Southern State Parkway on Deer Park Avenue between Parkdale Drive and Sylvan Road in the town of Babylon, county of Suffolk, to "Trooper Gerard B. Kane and Trooper Arthur B. Reddy".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to dedicating a portion of the state highway system to "Trooper Gerard B. Kane and Trooper Arthur B. Reddy"
